summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganCeraVe Hydrating Cream-to-Foam Cleanser with hyaluronic acid for balanced to dry skin removes oil and makeup while reinforcing the skin barrier with ceramides.
details: DetailsBenefitsOne-step face wash for daily facial cleansing, face and eye makeup removal, and long-lasting hydration.Gently removes dirt, excess oil, and even long-wear foundation and daily SPF sunscreen residue.Starts as a rich cream and transforms into a foam as it's lathered into the skinNow available in a refill format.Bottles* are made from 100% recycled plastic (excluding the pump)*8ozFeaturesFragrance free, paraben-free, and soap-freeNon-comedogenic (meaning it won't clog pores) and non-dryingAllergy-tested and pH balancedSuitable for all skin types, contact lens wearers, adults and young adults (ages 12+ years). Unisex.Ideal for normal / balanced to dry skin and sensitive skinCan be used as a face wash, body wash and/or hand soap.Key IngredientsHyaluronic acid: Attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture. Helps give skin a smooth, plump texture.Amino acids: Help support skin's Natural Moisturizing Factors (NMF), known to attract and retain moistureMVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for all day hydrationCeramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier, helping to keep moisture in and harmful elements out.Item 2570170How To UseStep 1.) Wet face with lukewarm water​Step 2.) Rub cleanser in your hands until you get a dense foam, then massage into face and eye area in a gentle, circular motions​Step 3.) Rinse wellAvoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.​Build your Everyday Routine with CeraVe:​Cleanse:​Hydrating Cream to Foam Cleanser: Cleanses, hydrates, and helps restore the protective skin barrierTreat: ​Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum: Replenishes skin hydration while helping restore the protective skin barrier​Moisturize: ​Moisturizing Cream: Moisturizes and helps restore the protective skin barrier​Protect: ​Hydrating Face Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50: 100% mineral sunscreen to reflect the sun's harmful rays plus three essential ceramides to help restore skin's natural barrier​IngredientsAqua / Water, Urea, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Cetearyl, Alcohol, Niacinamide, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, C12-13 Alkyl Lactate, Peg-100 Stearate, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Dimethicone, Triacetin, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Sodium Lactate, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium Edta, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin.
how_to_use: Step 1.) Wet face with lukewarm water​Step 2.) Rub cleanser in your hands until you get a dense foam, then massage into face and eye area in a gentle, circular motions​Step 3.) Rinse wellAvoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.​Build your Everyday Routine with CeraVe:​Cleanse:​Hydrating Cream to Foam Cleanser: Cleanses, hydrates, and helps restore the protective skin barrierTreat: ​Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum: Replenishes skin hydration while helping restore the protective skin barrier​Moisturize: ​Moisturizing Cream: Moisturizes and helps restore the protective skin barrier​Protect: ​Hydrating Face Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50: 100% mineral sunscreen to reflect the sun's harmful rays plus three essential ceramides to help restore skin's natural barrier​

reviews.headline: very convenient to have a refill
reviews.comments: I purchased the refill option and it was convenient and easy to use. it filled up my 16oz bottle and with some left over! I got it on a sale, so it was cheaper than buying a whole new bottle.

reviews.headline: Nothing special, no foam
reviews.comments: Meh, this was ok but not great.  Doesn't clean off mascara or eye makeup very well.  Doesn't really foam, mainly just a cream cleanser.  Not drying, but since it doesn't clean makeup off it's at best a second cleansing step.  I have dry skin and love Cerave, but this really didn't do much for me.  If your face is already mostly clean, it's fine, but if not use something else.

reviews.headline: My daily cleanse
reviews.comments: Great product, I use this every night, it removes all makeup including waterproof mascara, my skin never feels dry or tight after use.

reviews.headline: BEWARE if you have Fungal Acne!!!
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for years and have been struggling with severe breakouts. I recently found out that this product contains Cetearyl Alcohol which exacerbates fungal acne. After a week of using La Roche-Posay Toleraine foaming cleanser my skin is breakout-free and glowing!!

reviews.headline: Finally found a GOOD gentle cleanser!!
reviews.comments: I have tried SO many gentle cleansers. High end, low end, middle of the road- you name it, I've probably tried it. This is hands down my favorite. Gentle, hydrating, doesn't strip my skin.

reviews.headline: Barely did anything
reviews.comments: It does not remove my makeup nor did it actually clean my skin. Skin ended up clogged and developing acne because it wasnt doing anything to clean my face.

reviews.headline: Beat cleanser I've ever used
reviews.comments: Ive tried alllll the expensive face regimes: SkinBetter, La RochePosay, Clinique, Tula, etc.  The Cera Ve cleanser with cetaphil moisturizer is the BEST my skin has ever been.  I started having adult acne and tried others without results, but this is finally the product that works for me!

reviews.headline: Best makeup removing face wash
reviews.comments: This is my go-to for effortlessly removing makeup without adding anything extra to my routine. I usually use the regular hydrating CeraVe facewash but I keep this on hand for when I do my makeup and it never disappoints. It can cut through even the strongest waterproof makeup without fuss or having to scrub at your eyes. I'm also really delighted by the refill packaging. This facewash does taste very very bad, so be prepared if you're removing lip product.

reviews.headline: Good, but gives breakouts and can be drying
reviews.comments: Really nice because it does remove makeup and helps get any that you might have not gotten, but does occasionally cause small breakouts and can be drying.

reviews.headline: I love this and will always use it
reviews.comments: This is the best liquid soap I've ever used. It removes all my makeup and leaves my face feeling refreshed and clean.

reviews.headline: Amazing product
reviews.comments: Cerave has mastered their ceramide technology, all of there products are so good but this one is top tier. Not only does this cleanser have all the essential ceramides, it also has: urea, niacinamide, shea butter, salyclic acid, and lactic acid! You get so much good stuff in one cleanser. Its the prrfect cleanser for the end of the day to get all makeup, dirt, oil, etc. off. I hope cerave never gets rid of this product! I will buy for as long as i am alive!!!!

reviews.headline: Love it!!!❤️
reviews.comments: I love this product! l haved uesd this for a long time, it lasts a long time, I have have normal but oily in the T zone on my face, its very hydrating and its very good at removing my makeup but it takes a little more effort to remove my waterproof mascara and leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated, it does the job!!!

reviews.headline: My favorite face wash
reviews.comments: I have used several brands of face wash through out the years and none have cleaned my face like this one! I have dry combination skin and usually products are either for dry skin which makes my face too oily or it's the opposite. This one works perfectly on me! No dry patches or shiny areas. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Good Cleanser
reviews.comments: Make sure you double cleanse, but its a good product. I've been repurchasing for years. It's a tad expensive for drugstore, so definitely wait for a 20% or 40% off they do.

reviews.headline: Best bang for your buck!
reviews.comments: I have always been a drugstore kind of girl. If I can find good quality products at the drugstore, especially ones that will last me a long time. It definitely has my attention! This cleanser is everything and then some! I love that it supports my skin barrier it not only hydrates my skin, but also do you play cleanses it by foaming up. A little goes a long way and I just love the overall effect that it provides for my skin.

reviews.headline: Most definitely buy at Ulta Beauty.
reviews.comments: The Cerave face was is great to use anytime! It doesn't make it oily or perhaps greasy. The price was affordable. I would recommend this item to anyone. Thank you, Ulta Beauty!

reviews.headline: Dry skin
reviews.comments: I have used all cerave facial items. I tried this one because it supposed to be good for dry skin. I have very dry skin/ patches, living in high altitude cold colorado. This specific wash dries me out. So it does not work for me. I found that the hydrating foaming oil works! Takes off make up. But I do not get dried out with that one.

reviews.headline: Awesome makeup remover! Replaced my Purity Made Simple.
reviews.comments: CeraVe should market this as a makeup remover. This does a great job of removing long-wearing, full-beat makeup. I apply one pump to my face without lathering it first to break down the makeup, then wash a second time after lathering in my hands. I used Purity by Philosophy for 10 years- but this is better at removing makeup and is fragrance free! It does however dry out my normal/oily skin, so I don't think dry skin will like this as a cleanser.

reviews.headline: Repeat Buyer!
reviews.comments: I have purchased this product several times as it does a good job of removing makeup - even breaks down waterproof varieties! - without being super harsh or drying. I have not found it to "foam" as much as I'd like but it does the job so I keep re-buying. Sometimes I have to wash 2-3x before it gets everything off, but I've followed a wash with a quick swipe of micellar water to get off any remnants of really stubborn makeup and it works very well. Will continue to buy!

reviews.headline: Will buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I've used this product for many years now and love it.

media.headline: EXTREMELY dry skin after using this!
media.caption: One area where dryness was significant after using this product

faceoff_positive.comments: I'm in my 30's and I've been invested in skincare since my teens. I have no idea how I have overlooked this line of products for so long! I stuck to the previous products I used for so long. I never strayed until I accidentally ran into a horrible article about a product I was using so I decided to change things up a bit. Plus I decided I could use a bit more hydration. Seriously, I researched for hours, days and finally decided to try and wow. Just wow. I'm so hydrated and happy! My skin looks and feels great! I can't stop touching my face! The cream to foam is the best invention ever it feels sooo luxurious. Please don't ever change or discontinue the cream to foam, the daily lotion or the replenishing night cream. I seriously think I would die. You seriously have a customer for life. I've gotten both men and women in my family using it! I talk about it any opportunity I have! I LOVE CERAVE!!!!!!!!!!!!!.
faceoff_positive.headline: This is Life

faceoff_negative.comments:
I really liked this product at first because it removed eye makeup, but over time my skin became irritated and red. I couldn't figure out why and didn't think this could have anything to do with it because it was creamy, then after online searches, I found that deep in the ingredient list there's salicylic acid.  After discontinuing use for a couple weeks, my face feels better.  
If you don't have sensitive skin, this could be a good choice for you.
I'd suggest more clear active ingredient labeling.
faceoff_negative.headline: Unexpected Salicylic acid
